params._nameWrapper: The next version of the NameWrapper

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recoverFunds(address,address,uint256).details: The contract is Ownable and only the owner can call the recover function.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to recover.
params._to: The address to send the tokens to.
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to recover

renew(bytes,address,uint256).details: Function to renew a name for a specified duration.

params.duration: The duration for which the name should be renewed in years.
params.name: The name to be renewed in DNS format.

renewWithVersions(uint256,bytes,address,.details: This function is allows for the upgradeing of the NameWrapper and SubnameWrapper contracts. It is not possible to know what the interface of the upgarded contracts will be, so we assume that they will be compatible with the current version of the contracts.

params.duration: The duration for which the name should be renewed in years.
params.name: The name to be renewed in DNS format.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.duration: The amount of time the name will be rented for/extended in years.

returns._0: The rent price for the duration in Wei, and USD.

params._ownerCut: The cut for the owner of the contract.

params._referrerCut: The percentage cut given to the referrer (0-10%).

params._usdPrice: The price of the renewal in USD.

params.interfaceId: The interface identifier, as specified in ERC-165.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addNextNameWrapperVersion(address).notice: If the NameWrapper smart contract is upgraded, add the new version.

recoverFunds(address,address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens sent to the contract by mistake.

renewWithVersions(uint256,bytes,address,.notice: Function to renew a name for a specified duration.

rentPrice(bytes,uint256).notice: Gets the total cost of rent in wei, from the unitPrice, i.e. USD, and duration.

setOwnerCut(uint256).notice: A function to set the cut for the owner of the contract.

setReferrerCut(uint256).notice: A function to set the referrer cut percentage for a specific referrer.

setUSDPrice(uint256).notice: Sets the price of the renewal in USD/sec with 18 digits of precision.

withdraw().notice: A function to allow referrers, name owners, or the contract owner to withdraw.
